description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.YMGOKoZtKgJqIsAD]{Mechanic Trick}

As a reaction when you or an ally within 60 feet of you makes a ranged attack against an opponent, you can signal all allies within 60 feet of the attacking character. Signaled characters can take a reaction to make a ranged attack against the triggering opponent if they are within 60 feet of both the opponent and the ally making the initial ranged attack. All characters that attack the opponent using this ability become @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.aAQ6SW6iK0EVq8Ce]{Staggered} until the end of their next turn.
